service.query: SELECT A.STR_CD , A.EVENT_CD , B.EVENT_NAME , C.EVENT_S_DT , C.EVENT_E_DT , (C.EVENT_S_DT||C.EVENT_E_DT) AS EVENT_DT , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D','M002',A.EVENT_TYPE) AS EVENT_PLU_FLAG , COM.FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.CHAR_ID) AS USR_NAME FROM MSS.MC_EVTMST A, DPS.PC_EVTMST B, DPS.PC_STREVT C WHERE A.EVENT_CD = B.EVENT_CD AND A.STR_CD = C.STR_CD AND A.EVENT_CD = C.EVENT_CD AND B.EVENT_TYPE = '4' AND A.STR_CD = ? AND ((? >= C.EVENT_S_DT AND ? <= C.EVENT_E_DT) OR (? >= C.EVENT_S_DT AND ? <= C.EVENT_E_DT) OR (C.EVENT_S_DT >= ? AND C.EVENT_S_DT <= ?) OR (C.EVENT_E_DT >= ? AND C.EVENT_E_DT <= ?)) AND A.EVENT_CD LIKE ? || '%' ORDER BY A.STR_CD , B.EVENT_NAME

SELECT A.PRSNT_DT , A.PRSNT_NO --, CARD_CUST_ID AS CUST_ID , G.CUST_NO AS CUST_ID --, (SELECT CUST_NAME FROM DCS.DM_CUSTOMER WHERE CUST_ID = A.CARD_CUST_ID) CUST_NM , (SELECT CUST_NAME FROM DCS.DM_CUSTOMER WHERE CUST_ID = G.CUST_NO) CUST_NM , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D','M065',D.SKU_GB) AS EVENT_GIFT_TYPE , A.SKU_CD , B.SKU_NAME , (SELECT COMM_NAME1 FROM COM.TC_COMMCODE WHERE SYS_PART = 'D' AND COMM_PART = 'M004' AND COMM_CODE = REPLACE(A.PRSNT_FLAG,'5','1') ) AS PRSNT_FLAG_NAME , PRSNT_TIME --, (SELECT REFER_VALUE FROM COM.TC_COMMCODE WHERE SYS_PART = 'D' AND COMM_PART = 'M004' AND COMM_CODE = REPLACE(A.PRSNT_FLAG,'5','1') ) AS PRSNT_QTY , CASE WHEN RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY A.PRSNT_DT, A.PRSNT_NO ORDER BY A.PRSNT_DT, A.PRSNT_NO, E.SALE_DT, E.POS_NO, E.TRAN_NO) = 1 THEN (SELECT REFER_VALUE FROM COM.TC_COMMCODE WHERE SYS_PART = 'D' AND COMM_PART = 'M004' AND COMM_CODE = REPLACE(A.PRSNT_FLAG,'5','1') ) ELSE 0 END AS PRSNT_QTY , CASE WHEN RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY A.PRSNT_DT, A.PRSNT_NO ORDER BY A.PRSNT_DT, A.PRSNT_NO, E.SALE_DT, E.POS_NO, E.TRAN_NO) = 1 THEN (SELECT REFER_VALUE * PRSNT_AMT FROM COM.TC_COMMCODE WHERE SYS_PART = 'D' AND COMM_PART = 'M004' AND COMM_CODE = REPLACE(A.PRSNT_FLAG,'5','1') ) ELSE 0 END AS PRSNT_AMT , CASE WHEN F.CARD_DATA IS NULL THEN '미카드거래' ELSE '카드거래' END AS CARD_YN --, E.SALE_AMT AS SALE_AMT , CASE WHEN RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY A.PRSNT_DT, A.PRSNT_NO ORDER BY A.PRSNT_DT, A.PRSNT_NO, E.SALE_DT, E.POS_NO, E.TRAN_NO) = 1 THEN E.SALE_AMT ELSE 0 END AS SALE_AMT
, E.SALE_DT || '-' || E.POS_NO || '-' || E.TRAN_NO AS RECP_NO
-- , CASE WHEN RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY A.PRSNT_DT, A.PRSNT_NO ORDER BY A.PRSNT_DT, A.PRSNT_NO, E.SALE_DT, E.POS_NO, E.TRAN_NO) = 1 -- THEN MSS.FN_GET_EVTGIFTCARD(E.STR_CD, E.PRSNT_DT, E.PRSNT_NO, 1) -- ELSE MSS.FN_GET_EVTGIFTCARD(E.STR_CD, E.PRSNT_DT, E.PRSNT_NO, 0) END AS GIFTCARD_NO
, CASE WHEN RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY A.PRSNT_DT, A.PRSNT_NO ORDER BY A.PRSNT_DT, A.PRSNT_NO, E.SALE_DT, E.POS_NO, E.TRAN_NO, E.SEQ_NO) <> 0 THEN MSS.FN_GET_EVTGIFTCARD(E.STR_CD, E.PRSNT_DT, E.PRSNT_NO, 1) ELSE MSS.FN_GET_EVTGIFTCARD(E.STR_CD, E.PRSNT_DT, E.PRSNT_NO, 0) END AS GIFTCARD_NO -- -- 20140305 강연식 마케팅 김동하 사원요청 상품권번호 출력 (2개만 가능 2개이상일 시 함수수정필요)
FROM MSS.MC_EVTSKUPRSNT A, DPS.PC_SKUMST B, MSS.MC_EVTSKUMST D, MSS.MC_PRSNTRECP E, DPS.PS_DISCARD F , DPS.PS_TRHEADER G WHERE A.SKU_CD = B.SKU_CD(+) AND A.STR_CD = D.STR_CD(+) AND A.SKU_CD = D.SKU_CD(+) AND A.PRSNT_DT = E.PRSNT_DT AND A.STR_CD = E.STR_CD AND A.PRSNT_NO = E.PRSNT_NO AND A.EVENT_CD = D.EVENT_CD(+) AND E.STR_CD = F.STR_CD(+) AND E.SALE_DT = F.SALE_DT(+) AND E.POS_NO = F.POS_NO(+) AND E.TRAN_NO = F.TRAN_NO(+) AND F.SEQ_NO(+) = 1 AND E.STR_CD = G.STR_CD AND E.SALE_DT = G.SALE_DT AND E.POS_NO = G.POS_NO AND E.TRAN_NO = G.TRAN_NO AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.EVENT_CD = ? AND A.PRSNT_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? --20140306_강연식추가 마케팅팀 김동하사원 요청 영수증번호 표시 및 카드유무표시,상품권번호 표시 ORDER BY A.PRSNT_DT, A.PRSNT_NO

SELECT STK_DT AS PRSNT_DT , A.SKU_CD , B.SKU_NAME , D.BUY_COST_PRC AS SAL_COST_PRC , SUM(IN_QTY) AS IN_QTY , SUM(A.PRSNT_QTY) AS PRSNT_QTY-- 정상 , SUM(EXCP_PRSNT_QTY) AS EXCP_PRSNT_QTY -- 예외 , SUM(CPRSNT_QTY + CEXCP_PRSNT_QTY) AS RECOVERY_QTY -- 취소 , SUM(POS_NDRAWL_CAN_QTY) AS POS_NDRAWL_CAN_QTY-- 미회수 , SUM(ETC_PRSNT) AS ETC_PRSNT-- 기타 , SUM(A.PRSNT_QTY + EXCP_PRSNT_QTY - CPRSNT_QTY - CEXCP_PRSNT_QTY + ETC_PRSNT ) AS SUMQTY -- 정상지급+예외지급-지급취소+기타지급 FROM MSS.MC_EVTSKUSTOCK A, DPS.PC_SKUMST B, DPS.PC_STRSKUMST C, MSS.MC_EVTSKUMST D WHERE A.SKU_CD= B.SKU_CD AND A.SKU_CD= C.SKU_CD AND A.STR_CD = C.STR_CD AND A.STR_CD = D.STR_CD AND A.SKU_CD = D.SKU_CD AND A.EVENT_CD= D.EVENT_CD AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.EVENT_CD = ? AND A.SKU_CD = ? GROUP BY STK_DT , D.SKU_GB , A.SKU_CD , B.SKU_NAME , D.BUY_COST_PRC ORDER BY STK_DT
